data.enText: (in stories) an imaginary creature that is very large, ugly and frightening

data.chText: 庞然大物；庞大的丑怪物；丑恶的东西
data.enText: an animal or a thing that is very large or ugly
a person who is very cruel and evil

simple_means.memory_skill: monst〔= monstr〕显示 + er 表动物 → 太显眼的动物 → 怪物

tr: (medicine) a grossly malformed and usually nonviable fetus
an imaginary creature usually having various human and animal parts
a person or animal that is markedly unusual or deformed
someone or something that is abnormally large and powerful
a cruel wicked and inhuman person

value.def: A monster is a large imaginary creature that looks very ugly and frightening.
A monster is something which is extremely large, especially something which is difficult to manage or which is unpleasant.

example.ex: ...the monster which is now the London marathon.
example.tran: 目前棘手的大事，即伦敦马拉松赛

value.tran: 庞然大物;棘手的大事情

example.ex: The film will be a monster hit.
example.tran: 这部电影将会非常卖座。

value.def: If you describe someone as a monster, you mean that they are cruel, frightening, or evil.
value.tran: 残忍的人;吓人的人;恶人

trans: 怪兽小屋；怪怪屋；怪物屋；魔怪屋；怪兽屋
怪兽射击；怪物射击；怪物射手；怪兽终结者
妖怪派对；怪物聚会；怪物派对

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 加强 + monstr 显示 + ate 做，造成，使… → 加强显示 → 证明
de 加强 + monstr 显示 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 证明；示威游行
monst〔= monstr〕显示 + er 表动物 → 太显眼的动物 → 怪物
monstr 显示 + ous …的 → 太显眼的 → 巨大的
re 反对 + monstr 显示 + ate 做，造成，使… → 显示反对 → 抗议
